Invocation Name: landslide victories
des:
A Presentation by Dr. Bheemaiah Anil K, Synergy Robotics - BC, at the World Congress on Disaster Management 2021. The presentation is on the use of IoT devices in conjunction with the TOMU USB computer and the Echo Flex from Amazon Inc, a case study of flood monitoring and early bird warning systems using Amazon AWS at Lillydale regional park in st paul, Minnesota is presented.
This talk promotes the following products.
1. Wyze outdoor cameras for EarthCam.com
2. Sense2 IoT board by Silicon Labs for pollution monitoring and live sound streaming.
3. Mathematical sculptures from the KalkiChapel store on shapeways.com for housing the Sense2 IoT board.
Email the author at coderdojostpaul2@gmail.com with any QnA's
